snippet.title: Medieval Pig - Steam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
#rpg #actionrpg #medieval #indie #indiegame #medievalpig
Hello guys, it's pig! 🐷 And my first demo of Medieval Pig. It's action RPG in medieval setting, somewhere similar to Witcher 3, Kingdom Come: Deliverance. While developing, most important was to bring fun and joy with it...so I hope you'll have it 🐷

You are a pig in the Middle Ages who has been kidnapped from your home and is being taken somewhere. You barely remember your past, and the world around you is unfamiliar and alien. Miraculously escaping from your captors, you must embark on a perilous journey through uncharted lands! Discover their secrets and regain your memory! Can a pig achieve such feats? Oink!

Wishlist on Steam is a huge help and highly appreciated! 🐷
